item.title: Can You Transmog & Change Armor Appearance in Ghost of Yotei?
item.description:
Transmog is the ability to change the appearance of Armor without actually modifying what the Armor does, but is transmog in Ghost of Yotei ? While this highly desirable feature has made its way to plenty of games, Ghost of Yotei has a bit of a complicated answer to that question that we'll answer below. While everyone might want to change out Atsu's outfits and armor to create their own version of the Onryo, especially since some of the Armor is extremely powerful, the answer might not please everyone, but there's at least something there worth looking into.

Check in here to see all the Armors in Ghost of Yotei!

How to Change Armor Appearance in Ghost of Yotei

Does Ghost of Yotei Have Transmog?

Unfortunately, Ghost of Yotei does not have a transmog system . This means that you can't see the great bonuses of the Undying Armor associated with the Fundoshi Outfit. However, players can change the appearance of their Armor . If an Armor has a Dye or a different upgrade tier, then you can select Options, Gear, and click your Armor. From here, press the Square button to enter the appearance menu , where you can choose between the different Dyes that you currently have unlocked or purchased for that specific Armor. You can also use this menu to revert Armor changes with L1 and R1 , as each time you upgrade a piece of Armor, you will change the way the Armor looks. With this menu, you can revert those changes from the Tier 1 version all the way to the Tier 4 version. This will change the visual appearance of the Armor, but has no impact on the Armor's overall bonuses and upgrades.

Sadly, this is the only level of customization in Ghost of Yotei . Hopefully, a future update for the game will provide a transmog system so players can make the coolest-looking outfits without impacting the buffs and armor stats that they want to use for their builds.

9.7 /10
10 /10

Ghost of Yotei

item.title: Megabonk: AFK Gaming Challenge Guide
item.description:
Once players complete a tier in Megabonk , they will be able to replay it and select challenges to put themselves to the test. One of the most interesting challenges in Forest Tier 1 is the AFK Gaming Challenge which dares players to survive until the final swarm without moving or jumping.

Besides not being able to move away from enemies' sights, what makes Megabonk 's AFK Gaming Challenge particularly difficult is the fact that players can't move to interact with XP shards, chests, pots, and shrines, so it'll be extremely hard to upgrade their character. However, little by little, they will be able to grab some XP and level up, and if they choose the right upgrades, they might just complete the challenge.

Best Builds For the AFK Gaming Challenge in Megabonk

Since players cannot move when doing the AFK Gaming Challenge, they will quickly find themselves surrounded by enemies coming from every direction. Additionally, they won't get access to much XP since they cannot move to reach the shards, so they will mostly be stuck with their first weapon for some time.

For these reasons, players will have to take into consideration the strength and the default weapon of the character that they will select. Two characters have a clear advantage in the AFK Gaming Challenge, and that's Megachad and Athena . On top of having access to particularly useful weapons at the start of the run, their RNG Blessings, which are unique to each character in Megabonk , come in quite handy.

Megachad/Aura - AFK Gaming Challenge Strategy

Megachad's default weapon is Aura , which creates a protective field around him that is able to damage those who step inside. This makes it much easier for Megachad to survive the early game, when the weakest enemies appear. As if that wasn't enough he can flex on enemies, which stops them from dealing any damage and stuns them.

Once players pick up their first XP shards, they shouldn't invest in the Aura right away. They need to get an alternative weapon so they can deal more damage to approaching enemies or the Attraction Tome , so they're able to grab XP shards that fall farther away from Megachad.

Gamers won't want too many weapons here, as they need to invest in making the ones that they do have stronger to fight off stronger enemies when they begin to appear. The Knockback Tome and weapons that can push enemies farther away and back into Megachad's Aura are key. The Tornado is a good secondary weapon, as it knocks back enemies. As they upgrade it, it will increase its size, number of projectiles, as well as its damage and knockback power.

Athena/Aegis - AFK Gaming Challenge Strategy

The Aegis , Athena's default weapon, is a riskier choice, since enemies have to get up close and personal with this character for her to damage them. However, it makes it much easier to level up, as they will be killed close enough for her to grab the XP shards that they drop upon death.

This doesn't have to necessarily be done with Athena, evne though the Aegis is her default character. However, she is the best character for it because her RNG Blessing grants her Thorns each time she levels up and also makes her deal more damage the lower her health is, making it easier to survive the early game if too many monster take a hit at her.

The Cooldown Tome and the Knockback Tome are good combinations with the Aegis, as they will push enemies and give her some time to recharge the shield-like weapon.

How to Beat the AFK Gaming Challenge in Megabonk

Tips & Tricks to Complete the AFK Gaming Challenge in Megabonk

The characters, weapons, and tomes mentioned above can make it easier for players to reach the final swarm, but that's not all. There are other tips and tricks that will certainly help players survive the 10 minutes.

Become Familiar With the Level

In Forest, players will face an initial, slow-approaching horde, and the enemies can differ. Then, they'll face a mini-boss followed by a swarm. Then, the enemies will start to pour in slowly. Lastly, a swarm will appear followed by another mini-boss.

It is important for players to know the timing of each attack, so it won't take them by surprise. They should have weapons that are strong enough to take out a boss without being killed but should also be able to take enough monsters at once to avoid being overwhelmed by the swarms. Here is the exact timing of each attack in the Forest map:

  • 7:00 - First mini-boss
  • 6:00 - First swarm
  • 3:00 - Second swarm
  • 2:00 - Second mini-boss
  • 0:00 - Final swarm

The hordes of monsters will differ, and the challenge can be significantly harder depending on the first enemies that appear. Skeletons, goblins, bees, and slimes are much easier to take out compared to the runners and th explosive monsters.

As for the bosses, they will have to face both the Stone Golem and Chunkham the Terrible - it is random which one will appear first. The Stone Golem will summon sharp rocks from the ground that will send the player flying while Chunkham will burst a ball of mud, slowing down players' movements.

Purchase the Toggler

Once players purchase 40 unlocks in Megabonk , the Toggler will appear in the Shop. It costs 50 Silver but it can be quite helpful if players are trying to get specific items for a run. With the Toggler, players can visit the Unlocks screen and disable any weapon, tomes, and items that they have purchased.

This way, players can disable weapons and tomes that aren't useful for AFK Gaming. Players won't come by any items unless they're lucky, but in case that happens, they'll still want to disable items that aren't helpful.

There is a chance that players might be able to reach a chest and open it. In this case, toggling off as many useless items (in this situation) as possible is extremely important, as it will increase their chances of receiving a useful item, and it might just be crucial in making it to the end of the run. There are two particular items that are game-changing for the AFK Gaming Challenge in Megabonk :

  • Campfire - Standing heals the player
  • Idle juice - The longer the player stands still, the more damage they will deal (up to +100 percent damage)

Get Banish, Skip, and Refresh Charges

Since it's not possible to disable all weapons, tomes, and items with the Toggler, gamers will also want to invest in upgrade their charges for Banish, Skip, and Refresh. This way, when they're given a choice between upgrades that they don't want they can simply refresh them until they get a better choice, banish them if they're totally useless, or skip.

For example, since the Agility Tome won't help at all during this run since players have to remain still, gamers should consider banishing it. The same goes for any items that they might pick up or purchase (if they're lucky enough to get close to a Moai Shrine or a chest) that won't provide any advantages.

9.0 /10

Megabonk

item.title: Racing Games With The Best Graphics
item.description:
Racing games traditionally represent the tip of the spear in gaming visuals, standing among the most impressive on the market. Developers constantly try to push boundaries and deliver the most realistic graphics with authentic car models, believable lighting, and real-life racing tracks recreated in the smallest detail.

While usually quite demanding in terms of hardware, some racing games came close to photorealism almost a decade ago. As years go by, nearly every new entry in popular series like Need for Speed , Forza , F1 , or Gran Turismo becomes a new benchmark for visual fidelity in the genre.

Today, there is no shortage of visually stunning racing games, both open-world arcade titles and track-focused racing sims. From older releases that still hold up remarkably well through constant updates to lesser-known games built with Unreal Engine 5, here are the racing games with the best graphics as of 2025.

Only the visuals of the games below are considered, not their overall quality as racing titles.

Honorable Mentions: Need For Speed (2015) & DriveClub

Despite being over a decade old, two racing games still deserve a mention on a 2025 list for their graphics alone: Need for Speed (2015) and DriveClub (2014) . Both deliver almost unbelievable levels of visual fidelity considering their age, and by utilizing techniques such as cinematic lighting and flares, detailed car models, and impressive weather effects, they can at times outshine even modern racing releases. A true testament to their respective teams' artistic vision and smart use of the relatively moderate hardware (PS4) of their era.

Forza Horizon 5

Stunning & Diverse Open World

Forza Horizon 5
9 /10
27
8.4 /10
Released
November 9, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E for Everyone // In-Game Purchases, Users Interact
Powered by

Forza Horizon 5 enjoys its last year before the already-announced Forza Horizon 6 , set in Japan, will take its crown. Despite being released four years ago, few other racing titles can still match the visual quality of Forza Horizon 5 , powered by ForzaTech, which is even more impressive given that it's an open-world game with an enormous map to explore freely.

From stunning car models (and there are hundreds of them!) to the vibrant world of Mexico with dynamic seasons and varied weather conditions, Forza Horizon 5 remains the ultimate open-world racer, this year also bringing the series to the PlayStation family for the first time.

Gran Turismo 7

More Than Just A Driving Simulator

Gran Turismo 7
8 /10
8.0 /10
Released
March 24, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E for Everyone: Alcohol Reference, Use of Tobacco
Powered by

Gran Turismo 7 represents the pinnacle of PlayStation racing games with an emphasis on realism. It's a monumental and ever-evolving racing world that gets better with each new update, as Kazunori Yamauchi and his team at Polyphony Digital are known for their pursuit of perfection when it comes to representing motorsport and car culture.

For visual and audio quality, as well as the available car roster, it's almost impossible to compete with Gran Turismo 7 . The team utilizes groundbreaking techniques for sound design, physical simulation, and authentic recreation of cars and tracks, supported by years of expertise and collaborations with manufacturers and racing disciplines across the globe.

F1 25

Culmination Of Codemasters' Racing Technologies

F1 25
Racing
Systems
Released
May 30, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
E For Everyone: Mild Language, Use of Alcohol
Powered by

A notable step up from its predecessor in terms of technology, F1 25 's visuals are simply stunning, brought to life by Codemasters' current rendition of the ever-evolving EGO Engine. For this latest entry, the developers finally abandoned the old-gen consoles that had been holding them back for over a decade, starting with F1 2014 .

Following this decision, F1 25 emerged as one of the most beautiful modern racing games, equally convincing with its detailed racecar models, environments, and realistic lighting. For any Formula One lover, this is a worthy pick, both for the incredible technology at its core and the revamped handling model.

Forza Motorsport

A Racing Reboot With Ever-Evolving Visuals

Forza Motorsport (2023)
7.0 /10
Released
October 10, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
t
Powered by

Forza Motorsport embodies a full reboot of the iconic series, and while not everything was ready at launch, thanks to a constant stream of updates from Turn 10 Studios (over twenty released in two years), the game is finally approaching its goal of becoming the ultimate motorsport destination, rivaling the series' own legacy.

What's more, the devs continue improving the game's graphics, especially the lighting and weather systems, which is why two years later, Forza Motorsport looks and feels notably better than its launch version. Adding its flexible handling models, rich accessibility options, and plenty of content to the mix, Forza Motorsport stands as one of the most impressive racing games of today.

Need For Speed Unbound

Style Above All

Need for Speed Unbound
5 /10
8.1 /10
Released
December 2, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
Teen
Powered by

Probably the most divisive entry due to its artistic style, racing fans either love or hate Need for Speed Unbound 's look — but it's certainly unmistakable. Powered by Frostbite, NFS Unbound marries realistic car models and city environments with anime-inspired effects and sketchy characters, serving as a breath of fresh air amid the ocean of strictly realistic racing games on the market.

However, some fans still prefer the game without its bold personality, with PC mods disabling such effects being among the most popular. Despite that, it's hard not to wish for more racing games to experiment with visuals from time to time, and hopefully, Unbound won't be the last of its kind to break the mold.

The Crew Motorfest

A Virtual Vacation In A Tropical Paradise

The Crew Motorfest
7.2 /10
Released
September 14, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
t
Powered by

A direct competitor to Forza Horizon 5 , The Crew Motorfest aims to capture the same celebratory festival mood on a tropical island, moving away from the open-world America of the first two entries. Even though The Crew Motorfest is also available on last-gen devices, it's still a giant leap from its predecessors in every regard and stands as one of the most stunning open-world arcade racing games.

Graphically, The Crew Motorfest is undeniably pretty, elevated by the sheer variety of its environments, two huge explorable maps, a dynamic weather system, and the ability to soar into the sky by plane or explore the waters on a speedboat. At times, the game almost begs players to open photo mode to capture unforgettable sunsets over the Hawaiian islands.

Assetto Corsa EVO

Already Surpassing Its Legendary Predecessors

Assetto Corsa EVO
5.0 /10
Released
January 16, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
E for Everyone
Powered by

The next step in the series evolution, Assetto Corsa EVO represents a new ever-evolving hardcore autosimulator with a promising future. While it's too early to judge fully, given that the game launched in early access this year, it's already a confident step up from Assetto Corsa Competizione in terms of technology, with KUNOS Simulazioni delivering something truly special here.

Just like Forza Motorsport , Assetto Corsa EVO started rough, but with each new update, the game gets better and better, both in graphical quality and handling model. In less than a year, EVO has already become a much more impressive title, so if the game's support matches Competizione , there's little doubt that one day Assetto Corsa EVO will outshine that legendary game in every regard.

Wreckfest 2

Physics-Based Havoc Like Nothing Else

Wreckfest 2
Racing
Vehicular Combat
Simulation
Systems
Developer(s)
Bugbear Entertainment

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

A strong contender for one of the most fun racing games thanks to its physics-based havoc and the ability to create total mayhem on the track, Wreckfest 2 also impresses with its graphics, despite launching in early access just a few months ago. The first entry was already among the most technically impressive racing titles available, but with the sequel built entirely for modern platforms, it reaches a whole new level.

Wreckfest 2 looks great at all times, with detailed car models and tracks, but the real highlight is its best-in-class car destruction powered by a rich physics simulation engine. With even higher crash fidelity and more intricate component damage, Wreckfest 2 carves out its own niche while delivering a visual treat for modern players.

Rennsport

A Promising Step For Unreal Engine 5-Powered Racing

RENNSPORT
Racing
Simulation
Systems
Released
December 16, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

Rennsport is yet to fully launch this November, but the game has already been playable for almost a year in early access on PC. An incredibly ambitious racing simulator with photorealistic graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5, laser-scanned tracks, and uncompromising audio fidelity, Rennsport aims to capture the highest standards of modern racing sims and become a new major player on the market.

The developers closely collaborate with car manufacturers, real-world drivers, and racing communities to ensure the authenticity of the driving experience. The team is especially proud of their handling technology, as each car in Rennsport is designed to feel distinct and fine-tuned for racing, bringing realistic driving sensations to complement its visual quality.

Torque Drift 2

A Graphical Punch Above Its Weight

  • Genre: Racing
  • Developer: Grease Monkey Games
  • Released: November 28, 2024

Another lesser-known early access racing title, Torque Drift 2 is hard to ignore given how impressive the game already looks. Like Rennsport , it's an upcoming Unreal Engine 5-powered release set in a fictional, modern-day Japanese city. This combination of cutting-edge visual technology with a distinct urban style gives Torque Drift 2 its jaw-dropping and sleek presentation.

Detailed car models with deep customization, natural lighting, and richly designed urban environments all contribute to the game's outstanding image quality, with some photomode captures looking almost indistinguishable from real-life photos. Sure, there is still a long road ahead for Torque Drift 2 to truly make a splash, but hopefully, Grease Monkey Games can bring this promising title to its fullest potential with future updates.

item.title: Clash Royale Creator Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Clash Royale is one of the most popular mobile games in the world, and thousands of players play it every day, each trying to become the best. Many gamers often check resources, such as YouTubers or streamers, to understand their strategy or even copy their deck to be as good in battles. Once you have gained experience and a working strategy after watching the video, you can support your favorite player by redeeming Clash Royale creator codes. This way, after each purchase, the chosen creator will receive a piece of the profits, so it's a great way to thank those who helped you.

Updated October 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Clash Royale offers a wide list of creator codes that you can use to support your favorite content creators. These codes don’t provide in-game rewards but allow you to show appreciation to streamers and community figures who share guides, strategies, and entertainment. With many creators available, you can choose the ones you follow most closely. Keep checking for updates as more codes may be added in the future.

Clash Royale: All Creator Codes

The number of creators is growing every day, as is their fanbase. At the moment, there are already many creators in the game whose code you can redeem to support them. Below are all the current creators codes, so you can choose the one you deem your favorite.

Clash Royale: How to Redeem Creator Codes

Redeeming Creator Codes in Clash Royale is not difficult and will take you a few clicks. If you haven't done it before, here are the detailed instructions:

  • Go to the in-game store.
  • Scroll down until you see the Creator Boost section.
  • There will be a green Enter Code button in the Creator Boost section. Click on it.
  • After doing so, you will open a new menu with an input field and an OK button.
  • Now enter one of the above Creator Codes in the input field.
  • Click the OK button to confirm your choice.

It is worth noting that by redeeming the code, you will not support one creator forever. You can change to another at any time.

item.title: Roblox: Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs List (October 2025)
item.description:
Combat Warriors is similar to many other Roblox shooters, but it is especially addictive and fun because of its fast pace. In fact, someone dies here almost every second, so the developers decided to add kill sounds to diversify the gameplay. Roblox players interested in a complete list of Combat Warriors kill sound IDs can find it below.

Updated October 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Combat Warriors offers a wide range of kill sound IDs that let you customize how battles feel with everything from dramatic effects to funny clips. The latest additions expand the list even further, giving you fresh ways to change up the action. With so many options, you can set the tone of each fight to match your style. Be sure to check back for new IDs as more sounds get added over time.

All Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs (Combat Warriors Codes)

Combat Warriors has recently gained wide popularity, and players have fallen in love with this game because of its action and drive. The developers are eager to support this project and add various maps and new features, including more Kill Sound IDs. This article is constantly updated to provide players with all the latest information. Below, fans can find a list of Kill Sound IDs:

Codes Checked on October 4, 2025.

How to Redeem Kill Shound IDs in Combat Warriors

Redemption of Kill Sound IDs in Combat Warriors is a very simple task. However, if players are still having problems, this step-by-step guide should help to solve them. They should keep in mind though that to unlock the ability to redeem a Kill Sound ID, players will need to pay 199 Robux.

  • Open Roblox and launch Combat Warriors.
  • In the main menu of the game, find the settings.
  • Click on it.
  • Go to the "Audio" tab.
  • Enter the above IDs in the "Kill Sound ID" field.

Combat Warriors Tips and Tricks

To begin with, players need to learn how to move correctly, slide, dash, stomp, and so on, which will lead to success. The next step is to master the combat mechanics. It's not that difficult. Players just need to hit the enemy at the right moment. Completing daily quests is also a key to success, as these quests offer in-game currency with which players can buy new weapons.

Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Combat Warriors

One of the best things about Roblox is the huge variety of games on offer. This bodes well for those who are starting to get bored of their favorite Roblox games, as there are usually plenty of great alternatives just waiting to be discovered. Below, players can learn about the five best Roblox games like Combat Warriors :

  • Project Slayers
  • A One Piece Game
  • Arsenal
  • Dragon Blox
  • Base Battles

About the Combat Warriors Developers

The developers of Combat Warriors never released any other games. But, their group in Roblox already has more than 900K members, and this only indicates the good quality of the project and the hard work of the developers.

DIGITAL

Roblox is home to an ever-expanding library of community-created worlds and experiences. Whether you’re in the mood for an epic role-playing adventure game or just want to hang out with your friends, there’s always something new and exciting to play.
Connect with friends and millions of players from around the world across Xbox One, computers, smartphones, tablets, and virtual reality devices.
Mix-and-match accessories, body parts, and more to customize your avatar. You can be anything you want to be: a ninja pirate, a mermaid princess, a robot wizard, the possibilities are limitless.
